scripts.link: mkdirp ./dist/task/node_modules && npm run link:copy && npm run link:install
scripts.link:install: pushd dist\task && npm install vsts-task-tool-lib@0.10.0 && npm install semvish@1.1.0 && npm install compare-ver@2.0.2 && popd
scripts.content:all: npm run content:task && npm run content:vsix
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run content:all && npm run link
scripts.vsix:preview: tfx extension create --extension-id AdvancedInstaller-Preview --root dist --output-path dist --override {\"name\":\"Preview Advanced Installer\"} --rev-version
scripts.package:release: npm run build && npm run vsix:release
scripts.package:preview: npm run build && npm run vsix:preview
